definition: antipinch (e.g. preventing catching fingers in automatic car windows)
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: Then, a power window anti-pinch system based on LIN bus is designed and implemented.
sentences.chinese: 設計並實現了基於LIN總線的電動車窗防夾系統。
